Question
========
What should you ask the AI to provide when it generates or fixes code?

Answerlist
----------
* Only the final code, no explanation
* Explanations and documentation of what the code does
* A screenshot of the output
* A compiled binary

Solution
========
The unit recommends asking for explanations and documentation to understand and trust the code.

Answerlist

* False
